fields.name: PropertyColumns
fields.description: A string array of the names of output columns to be attached to Service Bus messages as custom properties.

fields.name: ServiceBusNamespace
fields.description: The namespace that is associated with the desired Event Hub, Service Bus Queue, Service Bus Topic, etc. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyKey
fields.description: The shared access policy key for the specified shared access policy. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyName
fields.description: The shared access policy name for the Event Hub, Service Bus Queue, Service Bus Topic, etc. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: SystemPropertyColumns
fields.description: The system properties associated with the Service Bus Topic Output. The following system properties are supported: ReplyToSessionId, ContentType, To, Subject, CorrelationId, TimeToLive, PartitionKey, SessionId, ScheduledEnqueueTime, MessageId, ReplyTo, Label, ScheduledEnqueueTimeUtc.

fields.name: TopicName
fields.description: The name of the Service Bus Topic. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.
